long_description: Smith Outlier sunglasses offer full coverage, 100% UV protection and a comfortable fit so you're ready for sun-filled adventures. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, carbonic polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact-resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Nosepiece and temple ends become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather. Glasses feature 6-base-curve lenses (the higher the number, the more curved the lens-Smith features sunglasses with 6-, 7-, 8- and 9-base curvature). Smith Outlier frames are made from bio-plastic Rislan(R) Clear (derived from non-GMO castor seeds) for a resilient, durable and consistent fit.
short_description: Smith Outlier sunglasses offer full coverage, 100% UV protection and a comfortable fit so you're ready for sun-filled adventures.
